statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ 11 \\ 2 \\ -10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ 3 \\ 15 \\ 0 \\ -18 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 10 \\ 2 \\ -6 \\ -12 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
